mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (fairy_tale_id, created_at, created_by, profile_id) VALUES (#{fairyTaleId}, SYSDATE, #{profileId}, #{profileId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE fairy_tale_id = #{fairyTaleId} AND profile_id = #{profileId}
mapper.select: SELECT ft.id, ft.title, ft.author, ft.thumbnail_image AS thumbnailImage, ft.page_count AS pageCount, c.name FROM favorite f JOIN fairy_tale ft ON f.fairy_tale_id = ft.id JOIN fairy_tale_category c ON ft.category_id = c.id WHERE f.profile_id = #{profileId} ORDER BY f.created_at DESC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
